channel.title: RessurectionX JOIN NOW!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.animated-gifs.eu/banner-maker/show.swf?baseURL=http://www.animated-gifs.eu/banner-maker/&clickURL=http://www.animated-gifs.eu/&clickLABEL=&flashLABEL=&url=http://www.animated-gifs.eu/&txt=RessurectionX%20%231%20RSPS%0DJoin%20today&card=http://www.animated-gifs.eu/banner-maker//banner_images/graffiti/6.jpg&tc=16777215&sc=52428&font=http://www.animated-gifs.eu/banner-maker/fonts/plainn_lib16.swf&tr=-1&ts=56&tx=81&ty=-4&glitter=0&rounded=0&bevel=0&sepia=0&theme=http://www.animated-gifs.eu/banner-maker/themes/matrix.swf&theme_al=100[/img][/center]
RessurectionX is a relatively new RSPS with a lot of great features, because this server is new we do need to fix a few things, however I'm sure there's a lot to keep you guys occupied.
Features:
Working nex [Spawn time needs to be lowered] Working dclaw, godsword, korasi specs Torva, Virtus, Pernix. Seasonal items such as Christmas ghostly, easter ring [works] snow globe [works] and much more.
Server has great and helpful staff, and I will be on a lot incase any of you guys need any help or have any questions.
Server has a good economy, it's not too hard but not too easy to make money, but bringing in new players gives you a chance at getting a random rare item, or donating gives you special items & area's.
Some Pictures:
Teleports:[url=http://prntscr.com/6q6rhn] http://prntscr.com/6q6rhn[/url]
Home: [url=http://prntscr.com/6q6s49]http://prntscr.com/6q6s49[/url]
Donator Shop: [url=http://prntscr.com/6q6sit]http://prntscr.com/6q6sit[/url]
LINK:[url=http://ressurectionx.x10.mx/forums/index.php/topic,4822.0.html] http://ressurectionx.x10.mx/forums/index.php/topic,4822.0.html [/url]
Use the link on this thread "Instant" as the one you download from the website is the old one.

item.title: RessurectionX JOIN NOW!
item.dc:creator: @Boss_Mark Boss Mark
item.description:
@Boss_Mark wrote:

[quote=“naseem142, post:14, topic:550925”][quote author=Boss Mark link=topic=669837.msg4478987#msg4478987 date=1428317798]

#1 I’m not the owner

#2 If you didn’t have to point out mistakes in everything people do, there would of been no need for me to comment and defend myself.

  1. Shit staff still doesn’t make me want to play.
    1.1) It’s against moparscape rules to post about the server unless you own it. There is no exception to this. even if “The owner said you can”.

  2. Maybe post a credible advertisement and say something like “We’re rebooting”. Because your advertisements current state is bad. And that won’t attract players.

[img http://www.quickmeme.com/img/3a/3a7290976fcab35354b0db4229ef97bc2ad1cfb8220744fe345445682c98dd92.jpg[/img]http://[/quote]

I think that people like you deter other people from bothering wih rsps , if you don’t take things seriosly how are others going to take your server seriosly? You can’t just create a server and then slap some donator items and just expect to earn shit.

You disgust me.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: RessurectionX JOIN NOW!
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

I really wish some people would put an inkling of effort into their advertisement and try to make it somewhat standout, or appealing. All this does is list some typical features found throughout a majority of today’s servers and showcase an OP P2W Donator Shop… Disappointing as usual. To keep it constructive, I feel that you’d find it much more beneficial to not half-ass your server advertisements as it’d bring more players to your server. Maybe look throughout the advertisement section for an example of a nicely advertised server and go from there.

Read full topic

http://puu.sh/h3mlH/a7641b4f9f.png

Yes, New, the old source is old, this is an entirely new source, note it in the post?

I’d like to point out that no where did you say you changed sources. Only that the client is old. But you can be the judge of that one.

[/quote]

Your attitude just shows you won’t be a very fit owner. And now I know not to try this one.

item.title: RessurectionX JOIN NOW!
item.dc:creator: @Boss_Mark Boss Mark
item.description:
@Boss_Mark wrote:

[center][/center]

RessurectionX is a relatively new RSPS with a lot of great features, because this server is new we do need to fix a few things, however I’m sure there’s a lot to keep you guys occupied.

Features:

Working nex [Spawn time needs to be lowered]
Working dclaw, godsword, korasi specs
Torva, Virtus, Pernix.
Seasonal items such as Christmas ghostly, easter ring [works] snow globe [works] and much more.

Server has great and helpful staff, and I will be on a lot incase any of you guys need any help or have any questions.

Server has a good economy, it’s not too hard but not too easy to make money, but bringing in new players gives you a chance at getting a random rare item, or donating gives you special items & area’s.

Some Pictures:

Teleports: http://prntscr.com/6q6rhn

Home: http://prntscr.com/6q6s49

Donator Shop: http://prntscr.com/6q6sit

LINK: http://ressurectionx.x10.mx/forums/index.php/topic,4822.0.html

Use the link on this thread “Instant” as the one you download from the website is the old one.
